title: Twitter delivers first profit, shares surge 25 percent

text:
Twitter delivers first profit, shares surge 25 percent Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 00:52 Thu, Nov 23, 2017 - (2:18) Follow Reuters: Reuters Plus | Reuters News Agency | Brand Attribution Guidelines | Careers
